alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 5:05AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Erie County Until 700 AM EST.... At 459 AM EST, radar and webcams indicated an intense lake effect snow band impacting northeastern Erie County. This snowband will be nearly stationary or drift south very slowly through 7 AM. Any southern drift of the band would bring very heavy snow into the city of Erie. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Snow rates in excess of 1 inch per hour... Locations impacted include... Erie, North East, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville and Northwest Harborcr. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. This is impacting parts of I-90. &&
